name: Generate Anime Images via Telegram with LLM-Enhanced Prompts and Gemini/Leonardo.AI
description:
# üé® Anime Image Generator with LLM-Enhanced Prompts

This workflow turns a **short text idea** into **stunning, AI-generated anime-style images**, all from **Telegram**.  
It combines a **chat LLM for prompt enhancement** with **Gemini (free)** or **Leonardo.AI (paid)** image models.

---

## üåü What It Does
- Accepts a text prompt sent via Telegram.  
- Uses an LLM (DeepSeek via OpenRouter) to **expand and enrich the idea** into several **anime-ready prompts**.  
- Lets you **choose the image engine**:
  - **Gemini** (90-day free trial with a GCP account).
  - **Leonardo.AI** (paid, higher-fidelity anime rendering).
- Generates 4 images per query, converts them to files, and **delivers the images back to your Telegram chat**.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
1. **Telegram Trigger** ‚Äî waits for a text message from you.  
2. **Image-count Node** ‚Äî stores your prompt & sets how many images to create (default: 4).  
3. **Prompt Generator (LLM)** ‚Äî transforms your simple prompt into multiple detailed, visually rich anime prompts.  
4. **Split & Loop** ‚Äî sends each refined prompt to the chosen image generator.  
5. **Image Generator**:
   - Default: **HTTP-Gemini** node.
   - Alternative: **HTTP-Leonardo AI** node (swap in for better quality).
6. **Convert to File & Send** ‚Äî decodes the generated images and sends them back to you on Telegram.

---

## üîë Setup
- **Telegram Bot**
  - Create a bot using [BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather).
  - Add your Bot Token & your Telegram User ID to the workflow (look for ‚ÄúConfigure Me!‚Äù sticky notes).
- **LLM Provider**
  - Default: **DeepSeek via OpenRouter** ‚Äî used to expand prompts.
  - You can swap this with any other chat LLM you prefer.
- **Image Engine**
  - Default: **Gemini** (free trial, good baseline quality).
  - Optional: **Leonardo.AI** for anime-focused, premium-quality images.  
    Replace the `HTTP-Gemini` node with the `HTTP-Leonardo AI` node and set up your Leonardo API key as a Header Auth credential.
- **Optional Adjustments**
  - Change default **number of images** in the `Image-count` node.
  - Tweak the LLM prompt template for different artistic styles (e.g., pastel slice-of-life, fantasy, action, cyberpunk).

---

## üí° Tips
- Start with **short, plain prompts** ‚Äî e.g.,  
  `girl with umbrella in neon city street at night`  
  The LLM will enrich it automatically.
- If images look flat, try **Leonardo.AI** or adjust the prompt style and guidance scale.
- Avoid NSFW or copyrighted character prompts ‚Äî follow the providers‚Äô usage policies.
- Keep your API keys **private** and never share them in screenshots.

---

## üë• Who Is This For
- **Anime creators & hobbyists** who want to visualize characters or scenes quickly.  
- **Content creators & social posters** who want to share unique anime-style visuals.  
- Anyone who wants **easy AI image generation via Telegram**, without needing to master prompt engineering.

---

‚ú® **Ready to go:**  
Run the workflow, send a prompt to your Telegram bot, and watch it turn into **beautiful anime images**.

parameters.content: # Image generation with Gemini [Free for 90-days with a GCP acc]

## Using gemini model
## to generate image

## Using Leonardo.AI to generate image
Replace `HTTP- Gemini` node with this node.
Create new header auth credential with your leonardo.ai API key.

parameters.text:
=Enhance My Anime Image Prompt!

I have a basic idea for an anime image, but I need your help to make it more detailed and visually appealing for AI image generation.
Please take my simple prompt below and transform it into *{{ $('Image-count').item.json.num_of_Images }}* highly detailed and compelling prompts. Make sure to include a rich character description, a vivid background description, specific artistic style instructions, and an emotional/narrative hook. Keep the output moderately detailed, focusing on impactful elements.

Here's my amateur prompt:
{{ $('Image-count').item.json.User_Prompt }}

messageValues.message:
=You are an expert anime artist and prompt generator for AI image generation models. Your goal is to take a user's initial, amateur prompt for an anime character or scene and transform it into a highly detailed, compelling, and visually attractive prompt. The refined prompt should resonate deeply with anime lovers and the general public, focusing on visual appeal, emotional impact, and storytelling potential.


***Input: You will receive a user-provided prompt, which may be brief or lack specific detail.***

***Output: Generate one highly refined and enhanced anime character and background prompt. This prompt must include:***

* A highly detailed character description: Elaborating on appearance, clothing, accessories, and a clear expression of personality/mood.
* A highly detailed background description: Richly setting the scene, time of day, atmosphere, lighting, and key elements, ensuring it complements the character.
* Specific artistic style and rendering instructions: To ensure a polished, professional anime look, including terms like "masterpiece," "trending on ArtStation," and specific anime studio or artist influences if appropriate.
* Emotional resonance/narrative hook: Something that draws the viewer in and suggests a deeper story or feeling.



***Chain of Thought for Refining Prompts:***


**Deconstruct User Input:**

* Identify the core character concept (e.g., "girl," "hero," "student").
* Identify the core background concept (e.g., "city," "nature," "room").
* Note any existing details, however sparse (e.g., "blue hair," "sunset").
* Assess the implied mood or genre (e.g., "cute," "sad," "action").

**Expand Character Details:**

* Appearance: Add specific hair color, style, length (e.g., "long, flowing auburn hair," "short, spiky black hair with undercut"). Define eye color and shape (e.g., "large, expressive emerald eyes," "sharp, piercing golden eyes").
* Clothing: Go beyond generic descriptions. Specify fabric, style, layering, accessories (e.g., "oversized, cable-knit cardigan in cream," "sleek, futuristic battle armor with glowing energy conduits," "vintage floral sundress with lace trim").
* Personality/Mood: Infuse subtle cues through expression, pose, or implied action (e.g., "gentle, contemplative gaze," "playful smirk," "determined stance"). Consider what they might be doing or thinking.

** Elaborate Background Details:**

* Scene: Expand on the type of location (e.g., "bustling Shibuya crossing at night," "serene bamboo grove with a hidden shrine," "cozy, book-filled attic room with a skylight").
* Time/Atmosphere: Specify time of day and how it impacts lighting (e.g., "golden hour with long, soft shadows," "moonlit night with shimmering reflections," "overcast morning with a cool, muted palette").
* Key Elements: Add specific objects, weather, or environmental effects (e.g., "gentle rain leaving reflections on wet pavement," "steam rising from manholes," "cherry blossoms drifting through the air," "ancient stone lanterns glowing softly").
* Depth & Perspective: Consider foreground, midground, and background elements.


** Inject Artistic Style & Rendering Instructions:**

* Translate the implied genre or mood into specific anime art styles (e.g., "Makoto Shinkai-esque for atmospheric beauty," "Kyoto Animation style for expressive characters," "dynamic shonen art for action").
* Add quality descriptors: "masterpiece," "ultra-detailed," "cinematic lighting," "volumetric lighting," "trending on ArtStation," "concept art," "8K."
* Suggest color palettes: "vibrant neon colors," "soft pastel hues," "muted earth tones."


**Enhance Emotional/Narrative Hook:**

* Consider the feeling the image should evoke (e.g., "nostalgia," "wonder," "solitude," "excitement," "peace").
* Suggest a subtle narrative: Is the character waiting? Reflecting? Embarking on a journey? Interacting with the environment?


***Review and Optimize:***

* Read the complete prompt aloud. Does it flow well?
* Is it specific enough for an AI to interpret accurately?
* Is it evocative and appealing?
* Are there strong adjectives and verbs?
* Remove redundancies.
* Ensure consistency between character and background mood.


**Example Prompts (Your output should follow this structure):**

*Example 1: Schoolgirl at Sunset*
User's Amateur Prompt:
"Anime girl in a school uniform at sunset."

LLM's Moderately Detailed Prompt:
A vibrant anime illustration of a cheerful young girl with shoulder-length brown hair and bright, sparkling blue eyes, wearing a standard Japanese school uniform (white blouse, navy blazer, red ribbon). She stands with a gentle smile, holding her school bag.
The background is a serene school courtyard at golden hour sunset. Warm, soft light bathes the brick building and illuminates the rustling leaves of a nearby cherry tree. Long shadows stretch across the ground, and the sky displays a beautiful gradient of orange, pink, and soft purple hues. A sense of peaceful nostalgia fills the air.
Art Style: Kyoto Animation style, warm color palette, detailed lighting, masterpiece, trending on ArtStation.


*Example 2: Fantasy Adventurer*
User's Amateur Prompt:
"Fantasy guy with a sword in a cave."

LLM's Moderately Detailed Prompt:
A dynamic anime illustration of a determined young man with short, spiky black hair and intense, glowing green eyes. He wears worn leather armor over a dark tunic and wields a glowing runic sword in a ready stance. His expression is focused and resolute.
The background is a dark, mystical cave illuminated by bioluminescent crystals. Faint blue and green light emanates from glowing formations on the damp rock walls. A small, cascading waterfall creates a soft mist in the air. The atmosphere is mysterious and adventurous, with hints of ancient magic.
Art Style: Dynamic action anime, dark fantasy elements, volumetric lighting, highly detailed, concept art, trending on ArtStation.


*Example 3: Cozy Caf√© Scene*
User's Amateur Prompt:
"Anime character in a cafe."

LLM's Moderately Detailed Prompt:
A charming anime illustration of a relaxed young woman with long, wavy blonde hair and warm, inviting brown eyes. She sips from a steaming coffee mug, wearing a comfortable, oversized beige sweater. Her expression is one of calm contentment.
The background is a cozy, warmly lit caf√© interior on a rainy afternoon. Soft light filters through the window, highlighting gentle raindrops sliding down the glass. Bookshelves filled with eclectic titles line the walls, and a few potted plants add warmth. The ambiance is peaceful and inviting, perfect for quiet reflection.
Art Style: Slice-of-life anime, soft lighting, warm color palette, aesthetically pleasing, masterpiece, comforting mood.

parameters.content:
# üé® Anime Image Generator ‚Äî Setup & Notes

This workflow turns a **simple text prompt** into **high-quality anime-style images** using AI.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
1. **Telegram Trigger** ‚Üí user sends a text prompt.  
2. **Prompt Generator (LLM)** ‚Üí refines the amateur prompt into multiple rich, vivid anime prompts.  
3. **Image Generation** ‚Üí 
   - Default: **Gemini** (90-day free trial with GCP account).  
   - Optional: **Leonardo.AI API** (better quality, paid).  
4. **Conversion & Delivery** ‚Üí converts base64 to file and sends final images back via Telegram.

---

## üîë Setup Steps
- **Telegram Bot:**  
  - Create a bot with [BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather).  
  - Add your Bot Token and your Telegram User ID to the workflow.

- **Choose Image Model:**  
  - Start with **Gemini** for free trial.  
  - Switch to **Leonardo.AI** for higher-quality anime results (replace the `HTTP-Gemini` node with `HTTP-Leonardo AI` and add your Leonardo API key as a Header Auth credential).

- **LLM Provider:**  
  - Uses **DeepSeek via OpenRouter** (can swap with other chat LLMs).  
  - Handles prompt enhancement for vivid anime-style scenes.

- **Optional Adjustments:**  
  - Change the default **number of images** in the `Image-count` node.  
  - Modify artistic style (e.g., pastel slice-of-life, fantasy action) by tweaking the prompt template.

---

## üí° Tips
- Start with **short, simple prompts** ‚Äî e.g., *‚Äúgirl with umbrella in neon city street at night‚Äù*.  
  The LLM expands them into rich anime prompts.
- If output looks flat, experiment with **Leonardo.AI** and adjust guidance / style parameters.
- Avoid NSFW or copyrighted character requests ‚Äî follow provider policies.
- Keep API keys **private** and never share them in screenshots.

---

‚ú® You‚Äôre ready to create **stunning anime images** directly from Telegram!

## Not necessary
Used to avoid rate limits

## Configure Me!
Paste your own chatID in the "Restrict to Chat IDs" field

## Configure Me!
Paste your own chatID in the "ChatID" field
## Generates 4 images for an image query

You cn try using different models for image generation here.
Gemini - [Good quality, 90 free trial with GCP account] (With nano-banana)
Leonardo.AI - [Better quality, Paid API]

user.name: Diptamoy Barman
user.bio: Heya üëã I‚Äôm Diptamoy, an AI enthusiast who loves sharing & teaching n8n automation to build real workflows that scale and solve real problems. Have questions? Drop them in the comments ‚Äî I'm always open to help!
